Algorithms

Class WiFi_Scan_approx_location

  • java.lang.Object
    • Algorithms.WiFi_Scan_approx_location

  • public class WiFi_Scan_approx_location
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a simple weighted finger printing algorithm for WiFi position - as part of OOP course - Ariel University 2017-2018.
    Author:
    benmo

    • Method Detail

      • approx_Scans_positions

        public static WiFi_Scans approx_Scans_positions(WiFi_Scans db,
                                                WiFi_Scans testing,
                                                int max_samples)
        This is the main function implementing the positioning algorithm for a given WiFi_Scan - with respect to a given DB (Testing set). The algorithm sorts each of the DB scans according to the correlation value to a given WiFi_Scan - the best 3-5 Scans in the DB are used to compute a weighted center (as in MAC_approx_location).
        Parameters:
        db -
        testing -
        Returns:

      • compute_correlation

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Weighted_WiFi_Scan> compute_correlation(WiFi_Scan curr,
                                                                          WiFi_Scans db)
        This function scan the list of WiFi_Scans and for each one computes its resembles (correlation) to a given current WiFi_Scan - the List is then being sorted according to the weight.
        Parameters:
        curr -
        db -
        Returns:

      • correlation

        public static double correlation(WiFi_Scan curr,
                                 WiFi_Scan db_record)
        This function computes the correlation between two WiFi Scan (curr, db): for each AP in curr, look for the same AP in db: if exists, compute the signal diff + some constant (MIN_DB_ERR), if not assume 100 db diff (NO_AP_DB_DIFF). let v(curr) be 1/(diff^c1 *curr.signal^c2): c1 ~ [0.2,1], c2 ~ [1,3]. Compute the value of PI(v(AP_i)), for each ap_i in curr.
        Parameters:
        curr -
        db_record -
        Returns:

      • diff

        public static double diff(WiFi_AP curr,
                          WiFi_Scan db)
